website_summaries.verdict: Treat your skin to this variety pack of high quality masks at a bargain price.
pros: Pack of 4 includes 2 clay masks: Avocado & Oatmeal and Dead Sea Minerals
Also includes 2 gel masks: Cucumber and Charcoal & Black Sugar
Each 6 ounce tube of mask has a subtle, pleasant scent
Plenty of value for the price
cons: Because it doubles as a sugar scrub, the black charcoal mask is a little messy and hard to apply

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to write a review after I used all of these! Black sugar charcoal: gritty as expected, I've used this before. Makes my face very soft and feel sooooooo clean! Cucumber mask: gets kinda tight as it dries. Smells lightly like cucumbers, made my face feel refreshed and cool in this heat! Note: this is a peel-off mask! Dead sea mask: gorgeous blue! Haha made my face feel clean, declogged! Avocado oatmeal: oohh one of my favorites! Got kinda tight as it dried. Odd smell, wasn't bad though. My face felt sooooo clean and healthy after I washed this off!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Decent mask line up for price point.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be good masks for the price. They came decently packed, and were properly sealed. I dont care for the sent of the cucumber peel away mask, but it is still a nice feeling mask that doesn't dry out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: they do a great job at what they're made for
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Freeman products for a while and although I can't say they've taken years off my appearance, they do a great job at what they're made for. And the price is nice as well. I like this variety pack because you can choose from a classic mud mask, a charcoal scrub, or a refreshing cucumber peel. All are freshly scented and I've had no skin reactions. I definitely recommend Freeman for anyone looking for a decent, basic mask at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: D. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Tube came broken
customer_reviews.text: One of the tubes had broken open, im unsure whether it was just a faulty tube or it happened in the mail
customer_reviews.author: Tom DeBaun

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to put in some spa grab bag gifts for friends. Good variety for the price, arrived as expected no damage. Two of them appeared to be thick and almost dried out rather than wet and gooey but when pushed they came out soft and squishy so it must be how it looks. Satisfied with the purchase. (:
customer_reviews.author: pinacolina

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: My face has never been sensitive to any creams. So first cream I used, I felt small tingling but I just assumed it was cleaning my pores, once I used a second one, my face felt on fire. I felt like I had a really bad sunburn for a week. So this is definitely not for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Currently icing my face
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in March and now I am icing my face because of this chemical burn. I've used the blue face mask before and it would get a little itchy right before I took it off. I didn't think much of it because it was dried out and I figured it would just be a little itchy because it was cracking. I was doing homework and waiting a little longer this time and now my face burns. Not bad enough to do to the doc. I'm sure it will clear up soon but still very unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: juliepooh

customer_reviews.title: Guys get over it. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I am a man that has never used any facial products. A friend suggested I try these and all I can say is they are excellent. I wish I’d have started using them a decade ago. I have tried all of them and they absolutely 100% are what they say. I guarantee you’ll love them all. Not ashamed any more. The results made me feel and look younger.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love them all. The purifying avocado and oatmeal one I thought smelled kinda funny. I kept thinking the kids needed to be changed. Other then that all is great. Good size bottles for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value in variety for my teenage girls
customer_reviews.text: I have three beautiful daughters, that are now teenagers and they are consistently worried about the health of their skin primarily their faces, so this product is amazing for them to try out different kinds to see what they like and to have plenty to share. I didn’t expect them to be as big as they were but they were big and most importantly they came quickly and the girls have decided on what they love so will be buying it again I recommend this to anyone who is not sure what they want for their skin were they like a variety of options without breaking the bank this is the best way to do it
customer_reviews.author: Demi Goddess

customer_reviews.title: I only buy Freeman brand face masks!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that I have found (and I've tried a lot) that doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. They smell so good. They don't have an overbearing nasty chemical smell, they actually smell like what they are made of! They are good for a slumber parties, a girls night in or just to relax at home and enjoy a simple, easy to use face mask. I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this brand of masks before. The exact ones but singles. I have LOVE THEM. But for some reason these smell like a bottle of perfume was dumped in them. It’s to over whelmjbg. It makes me have to think if these where even real ? Did you put purfume in them to hide the nasty chemical scent ? I’m super upset about this. I am getting a really bad head ache from these. My eyes are even burning the smell is so strong.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Wrong items received
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately did not receive correct items as stated in description or pictures. This was purchased as a gift for my teenage daughter so I didn’t open the whole package, so it was disappointing when she opened it it. We did receive 4, 6oz bottles, but 2 were the same kind. The charcoal mask she received was a mud mask & not the gel one as stated. She specifically picked out these 4 varieties so it was unfortunate that we didn’t receive the correct items.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieH

customer_reviews.title: Love these masks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these masks on a whim to bring with me on vacation for one of the few nights we'd have available to do a girls night. My friend and I used different masks but ended up loving both of them. I have since used 3 of the 4 masks I received and I love them. Some of the reviews said they had a weird smell but I think they all smelled great. My packages came completely intact with no issues with leakage or broken tubes. I think my favorite mask of the 3 I've used is the Anti-Stress clay mask. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Lately I have noticed my skin has not been fresh and smooth as it used to be, also now where I live we cannot enter a building without a mask. Today I used the refreshing cucumber, I love the way it smells and how smooth my skin felt after peeling it off. I did leave it longer than it said to only because I added a little more to my problem areas (chin and nose due to wearing the mask) I do have sensitive skin and I have had no problems!!
customer_reviews.author: esteban

customer_reviews.title: Really good for their price.
customer_reviews.text: The face masks are really good for their prices. My favourite is the anti stress turquoise mask. It actually makes my skin soft. The rest are good too although they’re not sure so much effect on my skin. My skin is dry and that’s why it needs moisture however I have noticed that the others especially the purifying green mask does make my skin cleaner. For this price does this face masks are really good and would recommend. Sometimes they do make my skin a little itchy but then there are no after affects. I love this face masks.
customer_reviews.author: Disha

customer_reviews.title: great addition to skincare routine
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate this set and it's helped improve my skin quite quickly. I bought this set because wearing face masks constantly caused my pores to clog up easily and breakouts to occur on my usually clear skin. I use the charcoal scrub and either of the clay masks once a week each and am back to clear skin i can be proud of. I tried the peel off mask and wasn't impressed but im sure others would appreciate it for themselves
customer_reviews.author: Shahzeb Khan

customer_reviews.title: Missing scrub
customer_reviews.text: This showed the set including the charcoal sugar scrub masque, but what I received was a charcoal sugar clay mask. The sugar scrub is one of my favorites and I was disappointed not to receive it, but didn't want to return the set because of 1/4 of the masques. The others are fine. They smell great, go on and wash off easily, and make my skin look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: JCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I really like these face masks and will definitely be buying them again. The textures are really good and they seem to do a good job in clearing up my skin which had quite a bit of acne on it. I was a little sceptical of the charcoal one, but really like it now. I have been using for almost a week now and they have helped so much. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: What a steal! Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at the high quality of these masks.Just googling the brand will show you tons of positive reviews from customers and experts all over the internet. This bundle was great and well balanced in terms of use. Every mask has its own purpose, and there's a lot of product in each bottle (a little goes a long way too). Great value for the price. I've been using regularly for about 4-5 weeks now, and I've noticed a difference. My skin tone is more even and much brighter, and my minor breakouts have significantly reduced. I plan on purchasing this product again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great masks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these masks! The only one I don’t use now is the cucumber peel. It made my face red and splotchy. All of the others included in this set have done wonders for my facial appearance. They do come without protective packaging but I have had no trouble with the other 3 masks in this set. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AngelicaJewels

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and every mask I’ve tried. Works just as expected. Leaves skin feeling great with no irritation, will mention that I don’t have very sensitive skin though. I am prone to break outs which these masks have never given me any issues. Giving three stars due to receiving the charcoal mask instead of the scrub that I was supposed to get.
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: All these masks work wonders to your face! I use the black sugar mask in place of my exfoliator! The stress relief mask takes longer than the time it says on the bottle to dry but it’s still really good. They all smell really good. The clay masks will stain so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: ALandriajl

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I always have used these face masks off and on and I love them. Then I run out. Since this has four in the package, I set up a spot in my bathroom and rotate using one each day. You don’t look great when it’s on your face but your face looks great afterwards! If this special continues, I’ll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Why do I even...

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: The masks that you peel off dont hurt as bad as others I've tried and they all smell good! They get a little bumpy if you take a while to apply all over your face and dry pretty fast (like 2 mins). The scents bother my eyes like how onions do but I dont get around scented things very often for that reason. This was worth it! They make my skin feel really soft and moisturized!
customer_reviews.author: Staci Bodkin

customer_reviews.title: Not a good set. Better to get them individually so you get what you want.
customer_reviews.text: Love the blue one, even though it dries out my skin. The cucumber gel feels like I spread doggie eye boogers or thick drool on my face. The black one is really nice. The avocado one dries my skin out really bad and provides no benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A.

customer_reviews.title: Not for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin is sensitive, but not toooo sensitive. I never get acne (fortunately) but after using the blue one, I was covered in acne for a few days. Most reviews about sensitive skin say it works for them, but definitely not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged; bottle caps broken and pieces in packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorites!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand facial products! As advertised and shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: 4 bottles for 12 bucks can’t beat it
customer_reviews.text: great products i love them, only one i dislike is the cucumber gel.. it’s clear so that’s hard to see to get it all on and then off. but the dead sea salt one is my fav it’s amazing it’s a clay destressing/ pore cleaning mask and it smells so wonderful and relaxes me !!
customer_reviews.author: Artemis Blyx

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I had the black sugar and charcoal. I've tried them all. These masks are gentle on my skin and I have VERY sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: emilee potter

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Package, Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Package was damaged when it was arrived & items were packaged strangely inside. I second guessed if they were new or not, but they seemed to be full. I've used 2 of them so far & love them!
customer_reviews.author: Rissa

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this package
customer_reviews.text: So I've used all 4 products now. My favorite are the avocado clay mask and the coconut clay mask. The cucumber peel was okay, but I think I applied it too thick, as it was hard to peel off. It was too sticky. And the Charcoal mask is fine, I just personally am not a huge fan of Charcoal treatments. But all the treatments made my face feel soft and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Darin Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great masks for my teenage daughter and son
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and split them up for Christmas presents for my teenage daughter and son. It’s a bonding time for them, they put their masks on and sit and laugh at each other. Hey, they are teenagers, I’ll take it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shyann Hill

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety! You get a lot of bang for your buck. They all make you look and feel like a goddess (afterwards) (you will look like a smurf while using the Dead Sea mineral clay mask but it’s okay because it will give your roommates a good laugh). It’s fun to have so many options to choose from, some days you’re feeling a deep cleanse and some days you want some classic moisturization. The cucumber peel-off one is very satisfying! My boyfriend approves even though his family harassed him the entire time. He was GLOWING afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: Ally Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Spa day essential
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect face masks for an at home spa day. Purchased some about at the beginning of the year for a girl's spa day I hosted and everyone loved it. They smell great and leave my skin feeling refreshed. Will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: peddenka

customer_reviews.title: Great varitey
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to pretend that these are the most glamorous face masks however, it is definitely worth the price. I have been using this brand for a while and they are great for experimenting with or for a relaxing evening every now and then. I am planning a movie night with my younger sisters and these are for sure getting busted out.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie K.

customer_reviews.title: 2/4 masks are AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I used these masks for an event where a large group tried different masks, and mostly everyone agreed about their quality. The blue clay mask and avocado clay mask are amazing, and make the face extremely soft and glowy. The cucumber mask really didn't do much, maybe pulled up a little dead skin if anything but it's definitely not a blackhead removing type of peel mask. The black charcoal mask is useless, everyone who used it complained that it made their face hurt, continuing into the next day being sensitive.Overall worth it just for those two clay masks!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Good pack to choose your faves.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this variety pack as it allows me to try them all and decide on my favorite. So far anti stress clay mask is definatly my favorite. I didn't enjoy the charcoal one very much but the smell was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nekko

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Just as everyone else has said, the black one is a sugar scrub, not a mask, but I really like it as a scrub..kinda makes the set perfect. The other 3 smell & feel great. So far, I love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 4 were right and they all work nicely
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have is for the charcoal gel mask/scrub I received the wrong one which turned out to be the clay mask I already have. Not too big a deal as I enjoy that mask as well so now I have a refill. One other thing is I hope in the future they put a tamper seal under the caps. Mine didn't show any sign of being used and returned but it would still be nice to have the seal for peace of mind
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: My friends loved them! Super sensitive skin beware
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for some of my friend and they loved them. However, I have super sensitive skin and broke out in cystic acne after using. I did try the sugar scrub in my legs though and it worked great! I would recommend the sugar scrub.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Schieltz

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of masks
customer_reviews.text: The cucumber mask didn’t peel like we wanted it or thought it would. All masks smell nice . There’s a lot of product in each tube. I would recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Mireya

customer_reviews.title: Incomplet order
customer_reviews.text: This order is incomplete I only receive two the blue and black
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: All four face masks are very different and fun, but they all leave my face feeling refreshed. The charcoal mask is an excellent exfoliant. The dead sea and cucumber masks are both soothing and cooling. And the avocado mask makes my skin feel very soft. It's a really good deal to buy this set.
customer_reviews.author: 1tiredmom

customer_reviews.title: 3 masks
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to these masks, because the price was so good for four! However, I only recieved 3 of the 4, (missing the peel off!) and the ones I did receive felt like they had been used before. Because this brand has no tamper seal on them however, it's almost impossible to prove :/ I'll be returning these, and will just buy from the store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Julia318

customer_reviews.title: I only use of them but the products are great nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: The Green Alvacado Oatmeal mask is the only one I use and you can really see a difference. Face gets lighter in tone, smooth and soft skin texture, I have acne which fades most of them after one use, no complaints but the rest of them dont feel as good on my skin. Gave them to my sister. I have combination skin but I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE all of these face masks
customer_reviews.text: LOVE all of these face masks. I only used to buy the charcoal/sugar scrub but after seeing the great deal on this bundle I decided to try them all. They are amazing - they smell good, they feel great and each one of them is different. I particularly love the peel off mask, as I often find them to be more of a pain when they don't peel off the way they should. This one comes off in one piece and is super easy to handle. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the cucumber refreshing and the blue sea one lol they feel amazing, especially the blue one (its a stress one) the black charcoal scrub one is a bit rough, by a bit I mean a lot. It kinda felt like it scratched a layer of my skin off. The avacado one, my skin didn't like at all, which is fine but I loved this!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great Masks!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand! The masks always leave my skin feeling clean and very soft. The only mask I don’t care for too much is the cucumber mask because it leaves my skin VERY oily. With that being said, my face is naturally oily so that may be why.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: VERY good value!
customer_reviews.text: These face masks are amazing! They work very well and the amount that you get for the price you pay is impressive. The clay masks are perfect for cleaning your pores and while it is on your face it makes it very relaxed. The cucumber peel off mask cools and refreshes your face from the first second you put it on. Lastly, the charcoal sugar mask cleanses your face and there is a noticeable difference when you take it off. These face masks last a very long time and the price is very good considering what you receive.
customer_reviews.author: gail roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Average face mask. The peel off one doesn’t really “peel” more like flake off in large pieces. Don’t really notice a scent.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lawrie

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: My favorite is the blue one but I love these masks I've used them for years and they always calm my skin and help me destress I have a high stress job and I always look forward to my days off where I can relax in the bath and put one of these on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Guys can exfoliate too!
customer_reviews.text: I liked every single product. As a man testing out a female product, I used them to enhance my face. it brought out my feminist look.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Faulisi

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really noticed the smell which means they don't smell bad, lol. I have always liked the Freeman line of facial masks. Their products are very inexpensive. It's a great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the scrub so far, but immediately you can tell this is far above most facial scrubs. I am using it once per day and it leaves my skin soft and not dry
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Fousek

customer_reviews.title: #selfcare
customer_reviews.text: bought for my daughter and she likes them. We have done the masks together and they smell good and work well. Came super quick to
customer_reviews.author: J . prescott

customer_reviews.title: good deal!
customer_reviews.text: i usually buy face masks from sephora which are $$$$$, but these are so cheap and some of them work better than the ones I have bought for $40+. some smell a bit weird but they have so much product and such a low price, you should at least try them to see if any work for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Great skin care product
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. I’ve used all of them and my skin looks and feels great. The cucumber is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kitzi

customer_reviews.title: Average face masks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girlfriend several months ago, and while using them at least once a week, she still has them! They definitely do what they’re marketed to do, but I wouldn’t go out and buy it again. There are other options that may be slightly pricier, but the quality goes up drastically. Overall still a great product though. She’s very content with how soft it makes her skin feel, and how it cleanses her pores.
customer_reviews.author: Austin K

customer_reviews.title: Great Results
customer_reviews.text: I've used the avacado peel off mask for several weeks and just got this shipment. I tried the black mud/black sugar mask and it feels wonderful. Can't wait to use the others! My skin is so soft and radiant that I can't believe it's really mine. But it is!
customer_reviews.author: Deemo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Packaging could have been better. Product showed up with some damage but not terrible. The masks are great!
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these out to my students for a stress relief day and there have been a lot of reviews. Personally, I love Freeman products and I have heard reviews that were good from my students. Good assortment for the price. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Cook James

customer_reviews.title: Good but too little.
customer_reviews.text: The bottle are full with air, only half of product, it is very good an affordable but come one, just reduce the package and it will bit give the feeling of emptiness that am feeling right now..
customer_reviews.author: Heidy Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the skin
customer_reviews.text: I have used the charcoal, and the peel off masks. Both of them ar refreshing, and clean the skin as expected. Good product for it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Sabid

customer_reviews.title: Good variety
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these masks for years and they have one for just about any skin type. I have oily skin so the mud masks are quite helpful, especially the charcoal one.
customer_reviews.author: Nino

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I used only one already but it worked great. My face felt so smooth afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good four pack of face masks!
customer_reviews.text: Great for a night of relaxing! These face masks come in very nice packaging and are overall good quality face masks!
customer_reviews.author: Julie L Rein

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. My favorite is the green avocado face mask. Least favorite was the cucumber peel-- only because it was difficult to remove all of the mask. I'd definitely buy again. A great gift for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: got these for my partner, the scent is great!
customer_reviews.text: got these for my partner, the scent is good, and they come in different flavors..
customer_reviews.author: Adam & Family

customer_reviews.title: Great skincare!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the dead sea mask and the black sugar scrub. These are my two favorite skin care items! I will use the black sugar scrub twice a week to exfoliate and it makes my skin feel extremely smooth and makes the skin appear brighter and more even. The dead sea clay mask helps to control my acne. The dead sea mask does dry out my skin, so I recommend using a good moisturizer afterwards. Overall, I am very happy with the results I am seeing from these masks.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: They are all low quality
customer_reviews.text: These masks are not high quality. This product is just a hoax.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Get them!
customer_reviews.text: They may not make you look 5 years younger but you will laugh like a little kid when you turn around with one on and scare someone! They really do work well & clear out your pores and just make your face glow after. Can slightly irrate your skin after it fully dried but it goes away quickly & was nothing more than being a little itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly hasman

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: You cant beat the price on these masks. One is definitely is a wash and not a mask but for this price you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good masks. A lot of product for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for the product. Each usually runs between $5-10 per tube. There is a lot of mask in each one also. This was a gift. I have used this brand for years and love it. I own each of these and myself and the person I gifted this to are both fans of every mask in this bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Marie Erin Jude

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good deal and the charcoal scrub was definitely my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis N.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bottles were bigger than I'd thought so I was happy about that. I've only used the charcoal and sea minerals and they've been excellent. In my opinion the clay can stain your fingers a little but but it's nothing to worry about. Personally, I think it's easier to apply using for fingers than I brush. Overall amazing product
customer_reviews.author: Jade Bender

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell they've done anything for my skin...
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell that the masks have done anything for my skin yet, but I can at least say I'm doing something for my skin regiment, even if it is just these. That being said, I would try a different mask, maybe that is the problem. But I bought them to pamper myself and I do feel more pampered.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Really worth it
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these masks. She uses them every week and they will last forever as the tubes are big.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Thorburn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal
customer_reviews.text: Excellent deal for this 4-pack. The facial masks work great and the variety enables you to try masks that you may not have considered trying.
customer_reviews.author: JoeandJeanne

customer_reviews.title: Major allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.text: Both of our girls had a major allergic reaction. We thought it may have just been facial but we tried it on their arms and mine as well. Red swollen, itchy. There is nothing listed in the ingredients that we are allergic to. I don’t know whose fault this is but I’m disappointed we are out this money.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lovell

customer_reviews.title: awesome deal.
customer_reviews.text: this bundle is fantastic, i already knew the products they sell them in any store but the deal was nuts and definitely worth your while.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I like 2 out of 4
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really like peel off masks and i don’t like the charcoal mask that’s why i wouldn’t give it a full 5 stars. But the other two masks are great and smell nice
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great face mask set for a good deal!
customer_reviews.text: When I was in high school, these were my favorite face masks! Love the variety pack idea. Good scents, good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Dehling

customer_reviews.title: Not super effective and packaging was a little messy
customer_reviews.text: They look pretty nice and they work decently but they aren’t super effective. One said it was supposed to moisturize and my dry skin just wasn’t helped at all. Also when it was shipped, the clear peel off mask had leaked inside the bag and there was dry gel all over the bottle. A seal under the cap would ensure no leaking

customer_reviews.title: BEST IN SHOW
customer_reviews.text: I did every single one as soon as I got them. They feel amazing on my skin as well as easy to clean, peel or scrub off! no harshness to the skin at all. Thank you for making an amazing product <3
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home skin care
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of face masks. Allows me to chose what I want based on my skin's needs. Will buy again when run out.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla R

customer_reviews.title: Really liked this variety pack
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this variety pack! Great for having options on what type of cleaning my face needs. My least favorite however is the peel-off cucumber mask as it's hard to make thick enough to actually peel. Love the others and use them all equally & frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Gage & Britt Newton

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable
customer_reviews.text: These masks get the job done really good great consistency
customer_reviews.author: Otesha Knights

customer_reviews.title: absolutely love this brand these products highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product there's nothing that I dislike about it especially the one for stress relief love it
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: More than expected
customer_reviews.text: These were more than expected. You get a great amount for the price, they all smell very good and make your skin so smooth. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks Pores
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected for this price point - left my skin feeling incredible soft - smaller pores
customer_reviews.author: Lori Matthews

customer_reviews.title: BEST....GIFT....EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mother for a birthday gift. She, as well as my stepdad, have thoroughly enjoyed them all.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome products
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for 3 years. I tried 6 different kinds of it and I love them all. Worth the price and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: nooshin

customer_reviews.title: got a wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this 4 pack and got three and some random mans cream instead of the 4th
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself males and females
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with these nice face masks I love doing them every 4 days and mixing it up.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne Richards

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, affordable, effective
customer_reviews.text: Don’t wast your money on expensive mask brands. These are phenomenal at doing their job, they create a relaxing atmosphere and smell great. Pamper yourself without spending double or triple for more expensive brands!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Receive All Items
customer_reviews.text: I am following up that only one thing was received for this. My daughter is very disappointed as she spent her own money in getting ONLY 1 of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pearson

customer_reviews.title: I love these. The only one I am half on ...
customer_reviews.text: Freeman masks will be replacing all of the other facial masks I buy. I love these. The only one I am half on is the black charcoal mask which is slightly stronger than I expected and heats as it cleans.
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

customer_reviews.title: I have pretty dry skin and I can't use the coconut or ...
customer_reviews.text: Trust the labels on the products. I have pretty dry skin and I can't use the coconut or avocado masks as beautiful as they may be, they just dry my skin even more. Love the cucumber mask however, it's not super hydrating for dry skin, but it does leave me feeling refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Kira LeCaptain

product_meta.title: Freeman Facial Mask Variety Pack: Oil Absorbing Clay, Renewing and Moisturizing Peel Off, Polishing Charcoal Beauty Face Masks , 6 fl oz, 4 Pack
product_meta.description: 1x - 6 oz Cucumber Peel off Mask 1x - 6 oz Charcoal Gel Mask 1x - 6 oz Avocado & Oatmeal Clay Mask 1x - 6 oz Dead Sea Mineral Clay Mask
feature_bullets: You will receive (4) 6 oz. tubes of Freeman facial masks
Avocado and Oatmeal clay mask nourishes and purifies by purging dirt and oil deep within pores
Dead Sea Minerals clay mask balances skin moisture while purging dirt and oil from clogged pores
Activated Charcoal and Black Sugar abosrb oil and impurities while exfoliating away dead skin
Cucumber cools and moisturizes skin while also peeling away impurities that cause rough and dull skin
